author: entertainment.ie
title: Bloomfield House Hotel & Spa
text:
Bloomfield House Hotel & Spa
'FREE EXTRAS' BREAK: €109pps midweek or €129pps weekend - 2 nights Bed & Breakfast and Dinner on one evening. This offer includes two free passes to Belvedere House and Gardens next door; shopping discount vouchers; full use of the Leisure Club with 20 metre pool, sauna, steam room and Jacuzzi. Two kids share free (room only).
Stunningly situated on the shores of Lough Ennell, this charming hotel offers the perfect location for a rejuvenating country escape.
Offer valid September 1 to December 23, 2015.
Get Deal
